pages.text: Chance to provide buffs to the caster and all nearby allies on successful spell casting and increases spell effect durations by 35%, at the expense of 15% increased mana cost. This modifier is unique to the (l:amethyst_imbuement:focus/getting_started)Spellcasters Focus$(), to obtain it you must ignite your focus to a new tier and select it from one of three options presented.

pages.mod_text: Your focus attunes to the lifeforce of its weilder and those around it. Appears on a Spellcasters Focus on tier ignition.
